channel.title: Torbjörn Molin - Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Torbjörn Molin - Blog

item.title: About
item.description: About I’m a freelance software developer based in Gothenburg, Sweden. I mainly do backend work in C# and .NET with the occasional frontend bits in javascript or typescript with one of the major frameworks. I’ve been interested in computers since my dad first bought an IBM 386 PC when I six or seven years old and programming has been with me in various forms almost since then.

item.title: Recommended reading
item.description: About the list This is a compilation of some of the things I’ve read and some videos that I like and also some things that are on my list that I haven’t gotten to yet. I think that some of it may be useful for people like me who are interested in and perhaps work with computers, programming and computer science but are self taught. Programming from the ground up by Jonathan Bartlett This free (available here under the GNU Free documentation license) really is what the title says.
